question: Some students are performing hardness tests on several substances. X scratches Y. Y scratches Z. Z scratches W. Which of these statements best describes substance W's hardness?
candidate_answers: (A) W is the softest of the four substances tested. (B) W is the hardest of the four substances tested. (C) W can scratch Y. (D) W can scratch X.
answer: W is the hardest of the four substances tested.
label: B
